resources.string: Found 1 vegan restaurant in the area
Found 1 vegan store in the area

string.name: user_reviews
string.i:
Mark has some of the best food in town! Get the mung bean pancake -Izzy

Food is great! Can't wait to go back again -John

string.name: trader_user_reviews
string.i:
The gluten free vegan cookies are to die for! -Eddie

 Every time I go I get the vegan mac and cheese! Try it, it's great! - guest 

 Wish the store was bigger, items are sometimes out of stock -Maggie

string.name: subquestion1
string.b: What is the best chicken substitute out there?

resources.string: Curd: Whole Foods General Tso\'s chicken is the best I\'ve tasted by far
Extra Firm Tofu from Trader Joes

string.name: subquestion2
string.b: Why does Aspartame have no taste when baked in a cake?

resources.string: Doesn\'t hold up to high temperatures
Exactly. Use saccharin instead, 300 times sweeter than sugar

string.name: recquestion2
string.b: I\'m getting bored with my tofu dishes. Any balling tofunking recipes out there? lol

resources.string: Dude, take a look at these http://allrecipes.com/recipes/everyday-cooking/vegetarian/vegetarian-protein/tofu/
I can\'t get enough of this http://www.eatingwell.com/recipes_menus/recipe_slideshows/quick_tofu_dinner_recipes

string.name: findquestion1
string.b: Where can I find Vegan Beer?

resources.string: Anheuser-Busch carries a lot of vegan beers. Try your local grocery store or a nearby 7/11
Sierra Nevada also has many vegan beers. The Pale Ale, Stout, and Summerfest are my favorites. Use this site to find em http://www.sierranevada.com/beer-locator

string.name: findquestion2
string.b: Where do they sell gelatin substitutes? I miss my jello

resources.string: You can pick up the vegan Knox at Whole Foods
I just use tapioca extract, works great and most stores carry! :)
